name: Pacman Recreation By Zamin
description:
This game is made for "The First Game Jam 2022 Winter Edition" (NOTE: This game was made in the ending 2 Days)

Play as The Hungry Pacman who wants some Pellets BUT...

There are Ghosts!!! (Spooky, isn't it?)

Controls:

W - Move Up

S - Move Down

A - Move Left

D - Move Right
